contentrichtext.text: {{Other uses|TIA (disambiguation)}} {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{Wiktionarypar|tia|tÃ­a}} '''Tia''' is the [[goddess]] of peaceful death in the [[Haida mythology]]. It is considered a duality. Its counterpart is [[Ta'xet]], the Haida God of violent death. {{DEFAULTSORT:Tia (Goddess)}} [[Category:Goddesses of the indigenous peoples of North America]] [[Category:Death goddesses]] [[Category:Haida]] [[Category:Haida goddesses]] {{NorthAm-myth-stub}}
